Package com.xith3d.spatial

Interface Summary
FrustumInterface Used for frustum culling.
RayIntersectInterface If a spatial object implements this interface then raycasting can be performed against it.
SpatialCallback Used for queries against the container.
SpatialContainerInterface A spatial container holds objects which implement the SpatialObjectInterface.
SpatialCuller Used to add user controlled culling
SpatialHandle A spatial handle is a reference returned when a spatial object is inserted into a spatial container.
SpatialObjectInterface Defines the interface for all objects which can be checked into the various spatial trees.
 

Class Summary
Visibility
